data.title: Eminem has one biological child and two adopted kids. Here's everything to know about them.
data.meta_description: Eminem, real name Marshall Mathers III, shares three children with his ex-wife Kim Scott: Hailie Jade, Alaina, and Stevie.
data.text:
This story is available exclusively to Business Insider subscribers. Become an Insider and start reading now. Have an account? .

Eminem shares three children with his ex-wife, Kim Scott: Alaina Marie, Hailie Jade, and Stevie.

Hailie, the subject of Eminem tracks like "Mockingbird" and "Hailie's Song," recently got married.

Here's everything you need to know about the rapper's kids.

Advertisement

Eminem is one of the most successful rappers of all time, having sold over 100 million albums worldwide and scored No. 1 hits worldwide.

What the real Slim Shady is most proud of, however, is being a dad.

"When I think about my accomplishments, that's probably the thing that I'm the most proud of, you know, is being able to raise kids," he said during an appearance on the "Hotboxin' with Mike Tyson" podcast in 2020.

This story is available exclusively to Business Insider subscribers. Become an Insider and start reading now. Have an account? .

Eminem, real name Marshall Mathers III, shares three children with his ex-wife Kim Scott: Alaina Marie, Hailie Jade, and Stevie. Here's everything you need to know about them.

Advertisement

Barnaby Lane contributed to a previous version of this article.

Advertisement

Eminem adopted his niece, Alaina Marie, when she was a child.

Alaina Marie Scott is the daughter of Kim's twin sister, Dawn Scott. She was born on February 22, 1993 in Michigan.

According to People, Eminem legally adopted her in the early 2000s as Dawn struggled with substance use. Dawn died in 2016 from a suspected overdose.

"My niece has been a part of my life ever since she was born," Eminem told Rolling Stone of Alaina in 2004. "Me and Kim pretty much had her, she'd live with us wherever we was at."

Advertisement

Alaina, 31, married her longtime fiancé, Matt Moeller, in 2023.

Alaina graduated from Oakland University in 2016 with a bachelor of arts in communication and a double minor in public relations and advertising.

She shares her travels and adventures on Instagram, where she has over 100,000 followers.

On June 9, 2023, she married her partner Matt Moeller in a ceremony in Michigan, surrounded by 125 of their nearest and dearest, including Hailie.

"Simply one of the best days of my life," she wrote on Instagram.

Advertisement

Hailie Jade is Eminem's only biological child.

Hailie Jade Scott was born on Christmas Day of 1995 in Detroit.

Before Eminem found fame, he worked 60 hours a week as a cook at a local restaurant to help fund her upbringing.

At age 6, Hailie was featured on the track "My Dad's Gone Crazy" alongside her father. After the song hit the Billboard charts in August 2002, Hailie entered the Guinness Book of World Records as the youngest performer to be credited on the R&B charts.

Throughout his career, Eminem has often mentioned his daughter in his songs, including "Mockingbird" and "Hailie's Song."

Eminem and Kim agreed to joint custody of Hailie after their second divorce, in 2006.

Advertisement

Hailie, 28, is a podcaster who recently married her longtime partner, Evan McClintock.

In 2018, Hailie graduated from Michigan State University with a psychology degree.

Today, she is an influencer with over 3 million followers on Instagram. She also has a podcast called "Just A Little Shady," a nod to Eminem's rap alter-ego.

In 2023, Hailie announced that she and her boyfriend of six years, Evan McClintock, were engaged. They married the following year with rap royalty in attendance, including Dr. Dre, 50 Cent, and, of course, her father.

During a 2021 interview with MailOnline, Hailie shared that she and Eminem were still "very close."

Advertisement

Eminem also adopted Stevie in 2005.

Born in 2002, Stevie Laine Scott is the child of Kim and her former partner Eric Hartter.

When Eminem and Kim reconciled after their first divorce, he adopted Stevie as Hartter reportedly dealt with drug addiction.

Hartter died in 2019 at age 40.

Advertisement

Stevie, 22, now lives a quiet life in Michigan.

In August 2021, Stevie came out as nonbinary in a TikTok video captioned, "watch me become more comfortable with myself."

Stevie is dating Declan Jace, a TikToker who often shares videos of them together on their account.

Correction: June 14, 2023 — An earlier version of this story misstated the name of the university that Hailie Jade Scott attended. It's Michigan State University, not Michigan State College.
